languages.text: Культ просуществовал до конца варп-полета. На протяжении этого времени несколько офицеров мостика и авгур-палубы пропускали смены и манкировали своими обязанностями. Сразу при выходе в реальный мир религиозное наваждение спало — и с участников сборищ, и с самого пророка, который, кажется, просто забыл, о чем проповедовал.

The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.
languages.original_text: Культ просуществовал до конца варп-полета. На протяжении этого времени несколько офицеров мостика и авгур-палубы пропускали смены и манкировали своими обязанностями. Сразу при выходе в реальный мир религиозное наваждение спало — и с участников сборищ, и с самого пророка, который, кажется, просто забыл, о чем проповедовал.

traits.locale_text: The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck kept skipping shifts and neglecting their duties. Upon arriving in realspace the religious fervor abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck kept skipping shifts and neglecting their duties. Upon arriving in realspace the religious fervor abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

languages.text: 亚空间航行结束之后，这支教派就自行解体了。但在此之前，舰桥与扫描甲板上的几名军官不断地逃班，玩忽职守。不过，舰船一抵达真实世界，这种宗教热情就减弱了，无论是对与会者，还是对先知本人而言都是如此，他似乎已经忘记了自己之前一直在说些什么。
languages.original_text: The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

traits.locale_text: 亚空间航行结束之后，这支教派就自行解体了。但在此之前，舰桥与扫描甲板上的几名军官不断地逃班，玩忽职守。不过，舰船一抵达真实世界，这种宗教热情就减弱了，无论是对与会者，还是对先知本人而言都是如此，他似乎已经忘记了自己之前一直在说些什么。

languages.text: El culto duró hasta el final del viaje por la disformidad, pero hasta entonces varios oficiales del puente y de la cubierta de augures se saltaban continuamente los turnos y descuidaban sus obligaciones. Al llegar al espacio real, el fervor religioso disminuyó, tanto para los participantes de la reunión como para el propio profeta, que pareció olvidar lo que había estado predicando.
languages.original_text: The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

traits.locale_text: El culto duró hasta el final del viaje por la disformidad, pero hasta entonces varios oficiales del puente y de la cubierta de augures se saltaban continuamente los turnos y descuidaban sus obligaciones. Al llegar al espacio real, el fervor religioso disminuyó, tanto para los participantes de la reunión como para el propio profeta, que pareció olvidar lo que había estado predicando.

languages.text: 教団は<歪み>を抜け出すまでの命だったが、それまでにブリッジとスキャナーデッキから何人かの士官が継続してシフトを抜け、己の義務を怠っていた。リアルスペースに到着すると、宗教に対する熱は弱まる…集まった者達もそうだが、予言者その人も、説教している事を忘れている様子だった。
languages.original_text: The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

traits.locale_text: 教団は<歪み>を抜け出すまでの命だったが、それまでにブリッジとスキャナーデッキから何人かの士官が継続してシフトを抜け、己の義務を怠っていた。リアルスペースに到着すると、宗教に対する熱は弱まる…集まった者達もそうだが、予言者その人も、説教している事を忘れている様子だった。

languages.text: La secte perdure jusqu'à la fin du passage dans le Warp, mais plusieurs officiers de la passerelle et du pont des augures ont régulièrement sauté des quarts et négligé leur travail. La ferveur religieuse s'apaise finalement dès l'arrivée du vaisseau dans l'espace réel, les sectateurs et le prophète lui-même semblant avoir tout oublié de l'incident.
languages.original_text: The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

traits.locale_text: La secte perdure jusqu'à la fin du passage dans le Warp, mais plusieurs officiers de la passerelle et du pont des augures ont régulièrement sauté des quarts et négligé leur travail. La ferveur religieuse s'apaise finalement dès l'arrivée du vaisseau dans l'espace réel, les sectateurs et le prophète lui-même semblant avoir tout oublié de l'incident.

languages.text: Der Kult hielt bis zum Ende der Warpreise, doch bis dahin schwänzten mehrere Offiziere von der Brücke und vom Augurendeck regelmäßig ihre Schichten und vernachlässigten ihre Pflichten. Bei der Ankunft im Realraum ließ der religiöse Eifer nach — sowohl bei den versammelten Teilnehmern als auch beim Propheten selbst, der offenbar ganz vergessen hatte, was er eigentlich gepredigt hatte.
languages.original_text: The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.

traits.locale_text: Der Kult hielt bis zum Ende der Warpreise, doch bis dahin schwänzten mehrere Offiziere von der Brücke und vom Augurendeck regelmäßig ihre Schichten und vernachlässigten ihre Pflichten. Bei der Ankunft im Realraum ließ der religiöse Eifer nach — sowohl bei den versammelten Teilnehmern als auch beim Propheten selbst, der offenbar ganz vergessen hatte, was er eigentlich gepredigt hatte.

languages.text: Tarikat, öteboyut yolculuğu sona erene dek varlığını sürdürdü. Ancak bu süre zarfında köprü ve alamet güvertesindeki bazı subaylar, sürekli olarak vardiyalarını aksattı ve görevlerini ihmal etti. Gerçekuzaya ulaşıldığında hem toplantılara katılanların hem de peygamberin dinî coşkusu dindi. Peygamber, vaazlarını tamamen unuttu.
languages.original_text: The cult lasted until the end of the warp voyage, but until then several officers from the bridge and the augur deck continually skipped shifts and neglected their duties. Upon arriving in realspace, the religious fervour abated — both for the gathering participants and the prophet himself, who seemed to forget what he had been preaching.
